activity_description: A beginner yoga class for those looking to improve flexibility and balance right at the local park.
Learn to make delicious and healthy meals and mastering the knife safely and with ease.

activity_name: Sip & Paint at the New Parkway
activity_description: Explore your creativity and practice painting techniques with a local artists who paint along side each other. Great opportunity to meet local artist and art novices.
Join a group of outdoor enthusiasts for a scenic hike in the mountains.
Tackle that 5000 piece world map puzzle.
Come along and get some locally grown fresh vegetables. It's also a great time to meet local artisan
